channel.title: Tau Cannon bugs or fix? VIDEO
channel.description:
I'm a huge fan of Half Life 1.. i still play online in death match and in lan with friends! i waited for a graphic remake of HL1 for years and years..and finally it arrives!! unfortunately i noticed differences between the Tau Cannon of Black Mesa DM and the Tau Cannon of Half Life DM and that compromises the gameplay based on this weapon!
Link of video: [youtube.com/watch?v=cfbqOm8DVgw](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cfbqOm8DVgw)
Some difference between Black Mesa and Half life using the Tau Cannon.Visualizzazioni: 5
1) The damage of the tau cannon through wall is extremely reduced
2) Tau Cannon is not effective through some walls
3) In half life 1 Tau Cannon hits even if the shot is not directed perfectly to the enemy
